version_description:
• Cynopsis Kids !magination Awards 2014 - Honorable Mention
• #1 Kids app for iPad in 80 countries!
• Minor bug fixes and improvements
• Fixed the issue with the Cupcake icing scene
Minor bug fixes and improvements. Thanks for playing Strawberry Shortcake Bake Shop!
Minor bug fixes and improvements. Thanks for playing Strawberry Shortcake Bake Shop!
Minor improvements. Thanks for playing Strawberry Shortcake Bake Shop!
Minor improvements. Thank you for playing Strawberry Shortcake Bake Shop
Minor improvements. Thank you for playing Strawberry Shortcake Bake Shop

***BERRYLICIOUS UPDATE***

The Bake Shop is now open with new very berry content! Join Strawberry Shortcake and all her friends for a baking adventure and create the desserts of your dreams!

MORE DESSERTS – You can now create even more recipes! There’s Cake Pops, Donuts, and so much more to create! Everything looks so good!

NEW FRIENDS – Strawberry Shortcake’s friends are joining in on this baking adventure: Lemon Meringue, Blueberry Muffin, Cherry Jam, Orange Blossom, Raspberry Torte, Huckleberry Pie and the Berrykins.

REWARDS – Complete my friends’ orders to earn stars and rewards! The more you bake, the more you can make!

NEW PANTRY – Collect all the rewards in your pantry! There are hundreds of items to collect, each more fruitastic than the next! Your desserts are going to look berrylicious!

The Bake Shop has a fresh new update with berrylicious recipes coming your way! Join Strawberry Shortcake and all her friends for a baking adventure!

NEW DESSERTS – You can now create 4 new recipes! There’s Berry Sweet Smoothies, Super Squares, Frosty Rainbow Slushies and Candy Apple Supremes! Everything looks so good!

FUN REWARDS – More recipes mean more rewards! Fill up your collection pantry with all your very berry content!
A few pesky bugs have been squashed for smoother adventures
